About

My name is Jamie Naasz. I live in Fargo, ND with my girlfriend Jenny, our daughter Arya, and our pup Max! I love coffee, animals, hiking, camping, and martial arts. I am currently attending a full -time (plus some!) full-stack coding bootcamp through Emerging Digital Academy. We have recently started our 3rd, and final, tier which will wrap up the first week of April. Tier 3 is all about real -world, client projects that will give most of us our first real world experience(s). The amount of knowledge I have gained from this course along with the people involved is truly astounding! This will allow me to change career fields and dramatically change the trajectory of my familie's lives! I am also working part-time at Scheels and hunting for a job in my new career field!

Mobile Bike Doc

This assignment was our first solo project! This is a full CRUD (Create, Read, Update, Delete) app with a PostgreSQL database. The user can create a login which will allow them to add thier bike to the database and go through a check-in process which will create a work order which can be accessed, altered, and completed by any registered user that is an 'admin'. All users default to 'customer' access, the access level can only be changed by directly accessing the database to manually change the access level. For more details, use the link below to access the Git Hub repo or visit the Heroku app.

Heroku App

Git Hub Repo

Authorization Shelf

This assignment was meant to introduce us to authorization and authentication, understand the differences and successfully implement both. Use the links below to check out the app on Herkou or vist Git Hub for more information!

Heroku App

Git Hub Repo

Pet Hotel

This assignment closely resembled the Authorization Shelf assignment in function (minus the login). However, this assignment used C# and .NET instead of the usual JavaScript and Node.js that the other projects in this portfolio used. This program allows the user to create 'pet owners' and 'pets'. The program will keep a log of owners, pets, how many pets each pet owner has, and whether or not the pet is currently checked into the hotel. If the pet is checked in to the hotel, a log of when the pet was checked in will be displayed.

Git Hub Repo

Movie Sagas

This assignment was one of my favorites. I love going to the movies! The posters, the atmosphere, the snacks! This assignment is a gallery of movie posters which was meant to remind the user of visiting the theater. The user will be brought to a 'landing' page that has a gallery of movie posters and their names. Each poster can be clicked on to display the description and enlarged photo of the movie poster. Users can add movies to gallery. To add a movie a user will need the movie title, a description of the movie, and a short url to the movie's poster. I hope this brings to you the feelings it brings to me!

Git Hub Repo
